nodes.text: Dark Times 17: Blue Harvest, Part 5 is the seventeenth issue in the Star Wars: Dark Times comic series and the fifth in the Blue Harvest story arc. This marks the 100th issue of Star Wars: Republic as counted on the inside cover as a continuation of the former series.

Betrayed, beaten, and half drowned, former Jedi Dass Jennir clings to life while the town he vowed to save is torn by gang warfare. His only allies have been imprisoned, tortured, or shot. It looks like the bad guys might win this time... except for one thing: a Jedi never gives up. Dark Horse Comics promises "bad-assery on an epic scale" in this issue.
